description: Lists the running Amazon EC2 instances that were discovered with commercial Linux subscriptions.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: An array of structures that you can use to filter the results by your specified criteria. For example, you can specify Region in the Name, with the contains operator to list all subscriptions that match a partial string in the Value, such as us-west. For each filter, you can specify one of the following values for the Name key to streamline results: AccountID AmiID DualSubscription InstanceID InstanceType ProductCode Region Status UsageOperation For each filter, you can use one of the following Operator values to define the behavior of the filter: contains equals Notequal (dict) --- A filter object that is used to return more specific results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria. Name (string) --- The type of name to filter by. Operator (string) --- An operator for filtering results. Values (list) --- One or more values for the name to filter by. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Instances
nested_items.description: An array that contains instance objects.

nested_items.name: AccountID
nested_items.description: The account ID which owns the instance.

nested_items.name: AmiId
nested_items.description: The AMI ID used to launch the instance.

nested_items.name: DualSubscription
nested_items.description: Indicates that you have two different license subscriptions for the same software on your instance.

nested_items.name: InstanceID
nested_items.description: The instance ID of the resource.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: The instance type of the resource.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The time in which the last discovery updated the instance details.

nested_items.name: OsVersion
nested_items.description: The operating system software version that runs on your instance.

nested_items.name: ProductCode
nested_items.description: The product code for the instance. For more information, see Usage operation values in the License Manager User Guide .

nested_items.name: Region
nested_items.description: The Region the instance is running in.

nested_items.name: RegisteredWithSubscriptionProvider
nested_items.description: Indicates that your instance uses a BYOL license subscription from a third-party Linux subscription provider that you've registered with License Manager.

nested_items.name: SubscriptionName
nested_items.description: The name of the license subscription that the instance uses.

nested_items.name: SubscriptionProviderCreateTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when you registered the third-party Linux subscription provider for the subscription that the instance uses.

nested_items.name: SubscriptionProviderUpdateTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp from the last time that the instance synced with the registered third-party Linux subscription provider.

nested_items.name: UsageOperation
nested_items.description: The usage operation of the instance. For more information, see For more information, see Usage operation values in the License Manager User Guide.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The next token used for paginated responses. When this field isn't empty, there are additional elements that the service hasn't included in this request. Use this token with the next request to retrieve additional objects.
